channel.title: Overview on GEOVID
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on GEOVID

item.title: Project Motivation
item.description: Syntax highlighting and menus can be configured via config.toml.

item.title: Objectives
item.description: Our group will focus on the following objectives: Visualize density of the COVID-19 cases in Hong Kong by performing relevant exploratory data analysis. Conduct global and local spatial analysis to find out spatial correlation patterns and influencing factors.

item.title: Literature Review
item.description: Spatial statistics and influencing factors of the novel coronavirus Taken from: (By: Yongzhu Xiong, Yunpeng Wang, Feng Chen, Mingyong Zhu) Yongzhu Xiong, Yunpeng Wang, Feng Chen et al. Spatial statistics and influencing factors of the novel coronavirus pneumonia 2019 epidemic in Hubei Province, China, 06 April 2020, PREPRINT (Version 2) available at Research Square [+https://doi.

item.title: Data Preparation & Analysis
item.description: Data Preparation Data Collection Data of the cases of coronavirus in Hong Kong, the quarantine building list, means of transport, population, as well as testing, are obtained from data.
